author: IGN
description:
The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered reviewed by Travis Northup on Xbox Series X, also available on PlayStation 5 and PC. Stick around after the score for an interview with Travis about the review process and his RPG tastes.

"The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered is an awesome nostalgic adventure that recaptures most of what I loved about the 2006 original, while sanding down many of its roughest edges. The result is a fantastic open-world RPG that’s aged quite well, with questlines and stories that are better than I remembered, modernizations (like the slightly improved leveling system) that remove some of the friction of the original, and loads of opportunities to make this adventure whatever you want it to be via the plentiful freedom afforded to you. On the other hand, not enough has been done to make this thing significantly less buggy than it notoriously was back in the day, and some design choices – like the enemy scaling and procedural Oblivion levels that become dul
title: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered Review

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Borderlands 4 just got a new release date, and it's earlier than expected. Not only is that good news for Borderlands fans, but also Grand Theft Auto 6 fans. GTA 6 does not have a confirmed release date, only a vague "Fall 2025," but with both games falling under the watchful eye of Take-Two Interactive, it could be that Borderlands dev Gearbox may have gotten word internally on GTA 6's release date, and moved accordingly to make room. Could both games be releasing in September? In other release date news, upcoming action soulslike Wuchang: Fallen Feathers has a confirmed release date of July 24th, along with details of its Deluxe Edition and pre-order bonuses. And finally, A Minecraft Movie madness is getting the official okay from Warner Bros., with the studio supporting "Block Party" screenings where viral acts of Chicken Jockey insanity are encouraged.
title: Borderlands 4's New Release Date Could Be a GTA 6 Tease - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Celebrate the spirit of unity and transformation during the Hellfire Gala Moments event. Watch the latest Marvel Rivals trailer for a peek at what to expect with the Hellfire Gala Moments event. Explore iconic spots across Krakoa, earn exclusive gifts, and vote for the star who will dazzle with a new look next year. You can complete Gala Missions to unlock a free exclusive Wolverine - Patch Costume reward. The Hellfire Gala Moments event begins May 2, 2025 (9AM UTC).
title: Marvel Rivals - Official Hellfire Gala Moments Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get another look at Star Wars: Tales of the Underworld in this trailer for the upcoming new anthology series of animated shorts from creator Dave Filoni. The voice cast includes Nika Futterman, Corey Burton, Artt Butler, Lane Factor, AJ LoCascio, Clare Grant, Dawn-Lyen Gardner, and Eric Lopez. The first two episodes of Star Wars: Tales of the Underworld premiere on the new Star Wars Watch Party island in Fortnite on May 2, 2024. All episodes of Star Wars: Tales of the Underworld will be available to watch on Disney+ on May 4, 2025.

The popular series, which began in 2022 with Tales of the Jedi and continued in 2024 with Tales of the Empire, this time focuses on the criminal underbelly of the Star Wars galaxy through the experiences of two iconic villains. Former assassin and bounty hunter Asajj Ventress is given a new chance at life and must go on the run with an unexpected new ally, while outlaw Cad Bane faces his past when he confronts an old friend, now a Marshal on the opposite s
title: Star Wars: Tales of the Underworld x Fortnite - Official Star Wars Watch Party Island Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Wishlist Trailer for Among Us 3D, a VR version of the classic social deduction game developed by Schell Games and Innersloth. Players will be able to gain access to new hats, cosmetics, and more for those who purchase the game. Among Us 3D is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming #AmongUs
title: Among Us 3D - Official Wishlist Trailer

author: IGN
description:
PlayStation and Gearbox are teaming up to bring us 20 minutes of gameplay from the upcoming Borderlands 4. Join us on April 30th at 2pm PT, 5pm ET, to watch all the looter shooter goodness. Stick around after the show with our Beyond crew who will give you a breakdown of what's showcased and thoughts on what's to come in the Borderlands franchise. 

#IGN #Gaming #Borderlands4
title: Sony State of Play: Borderlands 4 Gameplay Livestream

author: IGN
description:
Get another look at gameplay from Deadzone: Rogue in this latest trailer for the fast-paced roguelite FPS set in deep space. Blast through hordes of enemies with devastating weapons. Define your combat style with powerful augments and upgrades. Grow stronger with each death, solo or in co-op. Fight. Die. Revive. Repeat. Deadzone: Rogue is available now in Early Access on PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Deadzone: Rogue - Official Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Thunderbolts*, reviewed by Clint Gage.

Thunderbolts* is the most solid the sacred timeline has felt in a little while, providing an adventure befitting its overlooked title characters. While it very capably dabbles in a darker tone – touching on the mental health of heroes and villains alike – the filmmakers struggle to balance that dabbling with a snappy, comedic energy. While the movie as a whole left me feeling like it was a downer on the balance, it’s at least the good kind of downer, filled with characters I’m looking forward to seeing again.

#IGN #Marvel #MCU
title: Thunderbolts* Review

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Official Trailer for Now You See Me: Now You Don't, the third installment in the thriller suspense film franchise distributed by Lionsgate.

The Four Horsemen return along with a new generation of illusionists performing mind-melding twists, turns, surprises, and magic unlike anything ever captured on film.

Now You See Me: Now You Don't stars Jesse Eisenberg, Woody Harrelson, Dave Franco, Isla Fisher, Justice Smith, Dominic Sessa, Ariana Greenblatt, with Rosamund Pike, and Morgan Freeman. The film is directed by Ruben Fleischer and is produced by Alex Kurtzman, Roberto Orci, and Bobby Cohen.

Now You See Me: Now You Don't is releasing in theaters on November 14.

#IGN #Movies
title: Now You See Me: Now You Don't - Official Trailer (2025) Jesse Eisenberg, Woody Harrelson

author: IGN
description:
Did you just loot some shiny gear in The Elder Scrolls IV Oblivion Remastered, and now you’re wondering where to sell your stolen goods? In this video, we’ll show you exactly where to find fences and the requirements for unlocking them!

Many of the items you can fill your item bag with as you adventure around Cyrodiil don’t belong to anyone in particular. However, some things, like objects found in most homes and inns, or the jewels in a citizen's pockets, have an owner, and taking things without asking is stealing. Any stolen items in your possession will be marked with a red hand in your inventory, and you need to do something with them before they cause you trouble. There are a total of seven of them in Cyrodiil, but some are easier to sell to than others!

#IGN #Gaming #Oblivion
title: Oblivion Remastered: Where to Sell Stolen Items | All Fence Locations

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Season 3 Reloaded Multiplayer Maps Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, the latest installment of the iconic first-person shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. Players will soon gain access to a number of different maps for Season 3 Reloaded including the famous Black Ops 1 Numbers Station called Signal, Haven, and a redesigned version of Nuketown called Blazetown. Season 3 launches on May 1 for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6.

#IGN #Gaming #CallOfDuty
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 - Official Season 3 Reloaded Multiplayer Maps Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Release Date Announcement Trailer for Game of Thrones: Kingsroad, a story-driven action-adventure RPG developed by Netmarble Neo. Players will be able to explore the seven kingdoms that make up Westeros in the game’s vast open world, discovering vivid landscapes, massive cities, backwater towns, untamed wilderness, and the uncompromising lives of the people that inhabit them. Become immersed in King's Landing, Castle Black, and more all while encountering familiar characters from the series. Game of Thrones: Kingsroad is launching on May 21 for iOS, Android, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Game of Thrones: Kingsroad - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Kiborg is an ultra-violent, old-school-style action game that's part beat-'em-up and part roguelite. It hits PlayStation, Xbox, and Steam on April 30. Check out the launch trailer, and wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2405060/KIBORG/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Kiborg - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
A fraught mother-daughter relationship is put to a terrifying test when the family patriarch dies, and the grieving mother hires a mysterious stranger to bring her husband back from the dead. As the bizarre and brutal resurrection spirals out of control, both women must confront their differences as they fight for their lives – and for each other.

The film stars Colby Minifie (Ashley Barrett on The Boys) and Kate Burton (Grey's Anatomy). Serving as the feature debut from director Julia Max, The Surrender premieres on Shudder on May 23, 2025.
title: The Surrender - Exclusive Trailer (2025) Colby Minifie, Kate Burton

author: IGN
description:
ARC Raiders previews pretty well, perhaps because its design conservatism makes it so instantly familiar. There’s absolutely nothing here to challenge what came before, but sometimes, that’s okay. Previewed by Jared Petty.

#ArcRaiders #Gaming #IGN
title: ARC Raiders Is the Most ‘It’s Fine’ Game We’ve Played in a While

author: IGN
description:
Watch the FragPunk console launch trailer for this 5v5 hero shooter game. FragPunk is available now on PC, Xbox Series X/S, and PS5 (PlayStation 5).

#FragPunk #Gaming #IGN
title: FragPunk - Official Console Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Deluxe Edition Pre-Order Trailer for Wuchang: Fallen Feathers, an action soulslike RPG developed by Leenzee. Players will be able to access a suite of content for pre-ordering the game such as the White Spectre and Night Spectre costume set alongside special weapons to keep the enemies at bay. The Deluxe Edition for Wuchang: Fallen Feathers is packed with a host of different costumes including a Soul Ritual Robe, Tiger of Fortune, and more with added weaponry and Skill Points to use in the early hours of the game. Wuchang: Fallen Feathers is launching on July 24 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#WuchangFallenFeathers #Gaming
title: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers - Official Deluxe Edition Pre-Order Trailer

author: IGN
description:
There’s something wrong in Maybrook. Check out the creepy Weapons trailer for this upcoming horror/thriller movie from New Line Cinema and Zach Cregger, the wholly original mind behind Barbarian. Weapons stars Josh Brolin, Julia Garner, Alden Ehrenreich, Austin Abrams, Cary Christopher, with Benedict Wong, and Amy Madigan.

When all but one child from the same class mysteriously vanish on the same night at exactly the same time, a community is left questioning who or what is behind their disappearance.

Cregger directs from his own screenplay, and also produces alongside Roy Lee, Miri Yoon, J.D. Lifshitz and Raphael Margules, with Michelle Morrissey and Josh Brolin executive producing. The filmmaker’s creative team behind the camera includes director of photography Larkin Seiple, production designer Tom Hammock, editor Joe Murphy and costume designer Trish Sommerville. The music is by Ryan Holladay, Hays Holladay and Zach Cregger.

New Line Cinema Presents a Subconscious/Vertigo Enter
title: Weapons - Official Trailer (2025) Julia Garner, Josh Brolin, Alden Ehrenreich

author: IGN
description:
We talked to The Outer Worlds 2 creative director (and original creator of Fallout) Leonard Boyarsky and game director Brandon Adler about how Obsidian's own classic Fallout: New Vegas influenced the design of The Outer Worlds 2, and how this sequel improves upon the first game.

#TheOuterWorlds2 #Fallout #Gaming
title: How Fallout: New Vegas Influenced The Outer Worlds 2 – IGN First

author: IGN
description:
Check out the opening cinematic for Lekano World Online, the upcoming creature-collecting online action-adventure with MMO elements. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3552240/LEKANO_WORLD_ONLINE/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Lekano World Online - Official Opening Cinematic

author: IGN
description:
The voice of Gemma, Kristen McGuire, joins IGN to tell us about her experience working on CAPCOM's Monster Hunter Wilds. We also dive into her expansive career in anime, voicing characters seen in My Hero Academia, Dr. Stone, That Time I Got Reincarnated As A Slime, and so much more! You may have also heard her in the DLC for Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot as Baby Goku, and in Borderlands 3: Psycho Krieg and the Fantastic Fustercluck including its spin-off, Tiny Tina's Wonderlands. IGN's Akeem Lawanson dives deep into Kristen's role as the Smithy Gemma in #MonsterHunterWilds, but also explores her lengthy voice acting career in both video games and anime, including her roles in Genshin Impact, Yuri on Ice and many more.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Why Monster Hunter Wilds' Fans Are Obsessed With Gemma (Feat. Kristen McGuire)

author: IGN
description:
The moment-to-moment gameplay in Conquest Dark is remarkably simple. You just move and dodge (or use dodge-based abilities that can double as attacks), but there’s an elegance to it that we appreciate, and it kept us coming back with new ideas. Upgrades may be what put you over the top, but the magic happens when you step into the arena, in the moments between life and death. Previewed by Will Borger

#IGN #Gaming
title: Conquest Dark: Vampire Survivors + Cosmic Horror + Conan the Barbarian = YES

author: IGN
description:
Ninja cheerleaders. From space. Battling rogue AI. That's the setup for this 2D, fast-paced, four-player co-op arcade-style action game. This launch window and console announcement trailer celebrates the upcoming release of Ra Ra Boom on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox platforms in August 2025. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interestedhttps://store.steampowered.com/app/2335060/Ra_Ra_BOOM/

Take a look at the Bride Boss Pre-Order Trailer for Wuchang: Fallen Feathers, an action soulslke RPG developed by Leenzee. Players will fight and explore a chaotic time during the Ming Dynasty as a plague transforms ordinary people into monstrous creatures. Wuchang: Fallen Feathers is launching on July 24 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

description:
Check out gameplay from La Quimera, a sci-fi shooter written by Nicolas Winding Refn which takes place in a futuristic war torn Latin American mega city called Nevo Caracas. 
Gameplay captured on PC using an RTX 4090 with Ultra settings enabled.
